attributes.action: recognise ginger people as a disability group
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The ginger people of this great nation for a long time have suffered and their plight has gone unheard and is usually dismissed with a 'Shut it ginger' 
To be discriminated against this much makes us a minority group and we would like to be recognised as such with all the perks including one of those parking things (we'd like them in orange though)

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
